values.value: Your generosity has helped us disrupt homelessness for 12 young men this year — half of whom were justice- involved, and 92% had never had more than $1,000 in savings. Because of supporters like you, we were home to more than 2,400 bed-nights, provided over 300 hours of life coaching or therapy, 130 hours of financial advising, and supported residents in saving over $35,000 collectively. We could not do this restorative work without you.

Thank you for supporting Collective Chicago this year. If you're considering another gift before year-end, there's still time to double your impact - we’re just under $15,000 away from meeting our matching grant and closing the gap created by this year’s funding cuts. With so many non-profits facing similar challenges, we’re deeply honored by anyone who goes above and beyond to help us finish the match.

Thank you for your continued support and consideration.

Help Close the Gap — Give Here
A Chance to Double Your Impact + Your 2025 Giving Statement
